p: Like mRNA vaccines, DNA vaccines generate effective antiviral neutralizing antibodies by activating CD4 + and CD8 + T cells [ 171, 172, 173]. The DNA drug product is stable for a longer duration and can be deployed in an effective and executable manner [ 174]. To meet the large demand to treat patients across the globe, the DNA plasmid manufacture process facilitates the scaled manufacture of the drug [ 173, 174].
